BTudela@dsa.org.au you may want to flag with Aoife.

Cheers,

@heath DSA is not yet added to Harvest. Do i need to add to Harvest? If so, are they on Li

Hi Sheryl, 

Check it out:  https://dsa.org.au/about-us-disability-services-australia/jobs-at-disability-services-australia/

We had to do some custom coding to get it all working!!

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

While updating the pages just now, I also found this

Edit Page "Job Search" ‹ Disability Services Australia - WordPress (dsa.org.au)

I think the Job Search was created by Nyssa but not added to the site? What do you reckon?

Cheers,

Sheryl Dixit​​

From: Lewis Smith <lewis@myrecruitmentplus.com>
Sent: Friday, 13 May 2022 12:54 PM
To: Jessy Smith <jessy@martianlogic.com>
Cc: Sheryl Dixit <sdixit@dsa.org.au>; MyRecruitment+ <support@myrecruitmentplus.com>; Brittany Tudela <BTudela@dsa.org.au>
Subject: Re: Job board on Work@DSA

[THIS IS EXTERNAL E-MAIL] Think before you click on any links or attachments. If it looks suspicious, please forward the email to helpdesk@dsa.org.au

Hi Sherly,

Have you spoken to your IT team (or the Team who manage: https://dsa.org.au/about-us-disability-services-australia/jobs-at-disability-services-australia/ ) about including a job search function on your site?

Looks like your IT team implemented the job feed on your site using our WordPress plugin. The plugin provides a job search feature you can easily add to the page using widgets.

Have a talk with your team and if they have any questions feel free to put them in contact with me!


Lewis Smith
Client Success

Level 1, 1 McLaren Street,

North Sydney 2060 NSW Australia

+61 455 867 725

lewis@martianlogic.com

martianlogic.com



On Fri, 13 May 2022 at 12:43, Jessy Smith <jessy@martianlogic.com> wrote:
Hi Sheryl,

Chris is on leave at the moment, but I have included Lewis who will be able to assist you with the above items.

Many thanks

Jessy

On Fri, 13 May 2022 at 08:55, Sheryl Dixit <sdixit@dsa.org.au> wrote:
Thanks, Pav 😊

Martian logic.... cool!

Chris/Jessy, can one of you call me sometime today? Adding the 'search' function is a priority, the job board changes are just cosmetic to make it look pretty.

Cheers,

From: Pav Mayson <pav@martianlogic.com>
Sent: Thursday, 12 May 2022 6:12 PM

Subject: Re: Job board on Work@DSA

[THIS IS EXTERNAL E-MAIL] Think before you click on any links or attachments. If it looks suspicious, please forward the email to helpdesk@dsa.org.au

Heya Sheryl,

To be honest I can't really remember (I think it may have been a while), we can definitely help out but might be best to start with @Craig Baker or @Jessy Smith to discuss what you'd like done then we can action.

cheers,

On Thu, 12 May 2022 at 16:16, Sheryl Dixit <sdixit@dsa.org.au> wrote:
Hi Pav and Chris,

Happy Thursday 🙂

Just emailing you both as you have been across the MR+ Job board transition from the old website to the new.

Re: https://dsa.org.au/about-us-disability-services-australia/jobs-at-disability-services-australia/ we've been asked to refresh the job board layout, did someone from your team work with Kris to finalise the change in font, colour, layout etc, see below?

Kris no longer works for DSA so what's the best way to make changes to the above on MR+ ? Can you give me access so I can change? We also need to add a search engine, here's the one that was on the old site.



Please let me know, appreciate a quick response as we really need these changes done asap.

Cheers,
Sheryl

Sheryl Dixit​​
